name: Acrobat
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Acrobat points to a player. If that player is or becomes drunk or poisoned tonight, the Acrobat dies.

otherNights.description: Each night, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

information.customMessage: Choose a player to watch for drunk or poisoned.
